metadata.title: Beaufort Sea - Alaska USGS Open File 83-706*

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Environmental Satellite, Data
Information Service (NESDIS), National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC)

metadata.description:
The National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC) and the World Data
Center A for Glaciology**** jointly announce the availability of
data from two ice-gouge studies in the Beaufort Sea, Alaska.  The
studies were conducted by scientists with the U.S. Geological
Survey (USGS) and contain data, interpreted from side-scan sonar,
on the size, density, location, seawater depth, orientation of
dominant and subordinate gouges, number, depth, frequency, width,
and other relevant data for ice gouges in the Beaufort Sea.  The
large size of the data set has required computer-assisted methods
for the analysis and correlation of the ice-gouge
characteristics.  The data are available as two tape files.  File
1 contains 2,071 records of data for the Beaufort Sea shelf west
of the Canning River (USGS Open File Report 81-950).**  File 2
contains 372 records of data for the Beaufort Sea shelf east of
the Canning River (USGS Open File Report 82-974).
